title: Strengthening e-learning practical competencies: Strategies to enhance student engagement in asynchronous online science classes

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners improve concept comprehension to 80% or higher using interactive videos embedded in LMS reading materials.
Learners provide peer feedback at least twice weekly via in-video quizzes and discussion panels.
Learners analyze three or more application examples of scientific concepts using multimedia-integrated materials.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
